Jul 4, 2024 MSB first research

====================
msb-first
AA 73 67 74 67 40 00 - 99.0.  1010 1010 0111 0011 0110 0111 0111 0100 0110 0111 0100 0000 0000 0000
AA 70 07 74 67 40 00 - 99.1.  1010 1010 0111 0000 0000 0111 0111 0100 0110 0111 0100 0000 0000 0000



      011001110100
674 = 11001110100 - digit 9
675 = 11001110101 - digit 8
676 = 11001110110 - digit 8
678 = 11001111000 - digit 3


AA000000674000 only second digit - 9
AA000000675000 only second digit - 8
AA000000676000 same
AA000000677000 same
AA000000678000 only second digit - 3


AA000000675675 only first and second digits - 8
AA675675675675 all four 9



AA 000 000 675 675

last group of 3 digits control the first digits on the display

AA000774674000 - 99 dot, no last digit,  no mhz
AA010774674000 - 99, top segment of the last digit

AA700774674000 - 99.1
AA710774674000 - 99.7
AA720774674000 - 99.L
AA730774674000 - 99. reverse C
AA740774674000 - 99. H withiout first I
AA750774674000 - 99. 3 without lower bar
AA760774674000 - 99. 3 without upper bar
AA770774674000 - 99.3
AA780774674000 - 99.1
AA790774674000 - 99.7



AA 57 27 74 67 40 00 - 99.2
AA 77 07 74 67 40 00 - 99.3

AA 73 67 36 63 66 00 - 100.0

AA 05 60 56 63 60 00 - OFF


lsb-first
55 CE E6 2E E6 02 00 - 99.0.  1010101110011101110011000101110111001100000001000000000
55 0E E0 2E E6 02 00 - 99.1   1010101000011101110000000101110111001100000001000000000
55 EA E4 2E E6 02 00 - 99.2.  1010101111010101110010000101110111001100000001000000000
55 EE E0 2E E6 02 00 - 99.3.  1010101111011101110000000101110111001100000001000000000

55 CE E6 6C C6 66 00 - 100.0


initial commands in lsb mode

01
21

m


CPOL
MODE0 for SPI
